    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El Sistema Solar</string>
            <string language="en">The Solar System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Solarsystem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Système Solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Sistema Solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Sistema Solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat Didàctica en forma de WebQuest, adreçada a alumnes de cicle mitjà de primària, en la qual s'estudia el sistema solar. Inclou activitats de pràctica, d'estudi i d'autocorrecció sobre coneixements bàsics del nostre sistema solar, els planetes i llurs característiques, el Sol, les estacions de l'any, les fases de la Lluna, etc. Conté enllaços externs i una guia didàctica per al professorat.</string>
            <string language="en">A webquest, aimed at 8- to 10-year-olds, for studying the Solar System. It includes activities for practising, studying and self-correction on basic ideas about our solar system: the planets and their characteristics, the Sun, the seasons of the year, the phases of the Moon, etc. External links and a teacher's guide are also included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">asteroide</string>
            <string language="en">asteroid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">astronomia</string>
            <string language="en">astronomy</string>
            <string language="es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">natural sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">planeta</string>
            <string language="en">planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">satèl·lit</string>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">estrella</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Sol</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">univers</string>
            <string language="en">universe</string>
            <string language="es">universo</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein webquest, angestrebt 8 zu 10-year-olds, für 
das Studieren des Solarsystems. Es schließt Aktivitäten für 
das Üben, das Studieren und Selbst-Korrektur auf Grundideen über 
unser Solarsystem ein: die Planeten und ihre Eigenschaften, die 
Sonne, die Jahreszeiten des Jahres, die Phasen des Mondes, usw.. 
Externe Links und die Anleitung eines Lehrers sind auch 
eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un webquest, visé 8 à 10-year-olds, pour 
étudier le système solaire. Il inclut des activités pour la 
pratique, étudier et le art de l'auto-portrait-correction sur des idées 
fondamentales au sujet de notre système solaire : les planètes
et leurs caractéristiques, le soleil, les saisons de l'année, les 
phases de la lune, etc... Des liens externes et le guide d'un 
professeur sont également inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um o mais webquest, visado 8- a 10-year-olds, para
estudar o sistema solar. Inclui atividades para praticar, 
estudar e self-correção em idéias básicas sobre nosso sistema 
solar: os planetas e suas características, o sol, as estações
do ano, as fases da lua, etc.. As ligações externas e a guia 
de um professor são incluídas também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un più webquest, puntato su 8 a 10-year-olds, per
studiare il sistema solare. Include le attività per 
esercitarsi, studiare e la auto-correzione sulle idee di base circa il
nostro sistema solare: i pianeti e le loro caratteristiche, il 
sole, le stagioni dell'anno, le fasi della luna, ecc. I 
collegamenti esterni e la guida dell'insegnante egualmente sono 
inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας pjo' ωεψquεστ, στοχευμένος σε 8 στο 10-έτος, 
για τη μελέτη του ηλιακού συστήματος. Περιλαμβάνει τις 
δραστηριότητες για την άσκηση, τη μελέτη και την μόνος-διόρθωση 
στις βασικές ιδέες για το ηλιακό σύστημά μας: οι πλανήτες 
και τα χαρακτηριστικά τους, ο ήλιος, οι εποχές του έτους, οι 
φάσεις του φεγγαριού, οι εξωτερικές συνδέσεις κ.λπ. και ο οδηγός 
ενός δασκάλου συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
